    • checkForTies

      public boolean checkForTies(List<Player> list)
      Checks index 0 and index 1 of a List of Player objects and checks whether their points are the same or different.
      Parameters:
      list - - A List of Player Objects
      Returns:
      true if the first 2 players in the list have the same points, false otherwise.

    • setWinner

      public void setWinner(int index)
      Takes the index of a player in the player list as a parameter and uses it to add 1 point to that player's score, therefore breaking the tie.
      Parameters:
      index - - index of winning player in the Player list.
